attributes.action: National Service For all School Leavers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The National Service at one time in this Country of ours used to be compulsory, every child that left School had to spend three years of their life in the armed forces.
But times have changed, we see teenagers out at night standing on street corners on benefits, no skill no job prospects a big drain on the TAX payer. there's jobs out there be it nursing, Doctors, I.T., Mechanic you name it you can learn it in the Army.
they don't have to pick up a gun to learn a trade but other than learn a trade they will learn respect, health ie keeping fit, discipline and every thing else that the army are great at, let them spend five years in there they will come out with a qualification there will be no job gaps every one will be skilled. not a lay about can't be bothered to get out of bed to look for a job, just want hang out on street corners. Come on you people vote for this and let Blair take note and put the wheels in motion!!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
